I just ran this report with my genealogy software - it might be a bit 
hard to follow because so many people have more than one spouse, etc. 
but the index at the end should help. Where I didn't know the 
mother's or spouse's name, I just put in (Lady).  also, when you see 
a * that means that the name appears more than once because they have 
multiple spouses.  It isn't nearly finished, but if anyone notices 
any errors, please let me know:

1 Nobuhide Oda
----------------------------------------

Children:	
        Nobunaga (1534-1582)
	Nobuhiro
	Nobuyuki
	Oichi
	Nobukane (1543-1614)
	Nagamasu (1547-1621)
	Nagatoshi (-1582)
	Nobuoki (-1570)

1.1a Nobunaga Oda*
----------------------------------------
Birth:	1534, Owari Province
Death:	1582, Honnouji

Spouse:	Kitsuno
Birth:	1538
Father:	Iemune Ikoma

Children:	Nobutada (1557-1582)
	Nobuo (1558-1630)
	Tokuhime (1559-1636)

Other Spouses Nouhime, UNNAMED

1.1a.1a Nobutada Oda*
----------------------------------------
Birth:	1557
Death:	1582

Children:	Hidenobu (1581-1602)

Other Spouses Matsuhime Takeda

1.1a.1a.1 Hidenobu Oda
----------------------------------------
Birth:	1581
Death:	1602, Mt. Koya

1.1a.1b Nobutada Oda* (See above)
----------------------------------------

Spouse:	Matsuhime Takeda
Father:	Harunobu (Shingen) Takeda (1521-1573)
Mother:	(Lady) Aburagawa

Other Spouses None
